article_title: First Biosimilar Poised For FDA Approval

article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.description: Patients and payers have been anxiously awaiting approval of the first “biosimilar” medicines in the United States, hoping the new biologics will lower the cost of these often lifesaving treatments. But early statements from makers of the first of these drugs likely to reach the market indicate that the company expects [...]
